## IEnable interface

Interface to provide enabled/disabled functionality. Also see `@IEnable` decorator mixin

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IEnable<T> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [disable(opts)](./api.ienable.disable.md) | Disables this entity. |
|  [enable(opts)](./api.ienable.enable.md) | Enables this entity. |
